actions.name: Temporal Rift

cost.trigger: The user's damaging Psychic-Type attack hits a creature.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user's damaging Psychic-Type attack hits a creature.

Effect: The user freely uses the triggering attack again with [Delay 2]. Attacks innately possessing [Delay X] cannot trigger this ability and have 30% increased Power.
